title: Font Similar to Myriad Pro?
content:
Can anyone identify the font in this logo? It looks an awful lot like Myriad, but you’ll notice that the crossbar is higher on the A, the bowls on the B are different, and the Os seem much rounder.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091025084524im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Metabolon_6331.jpg)
author: 5e

comments.content: Eras is what I thought at first (and edited my post when I saw it isn’t).
